member.name: T:BayesServer.Data.Sampling.DataSampler
member.summary: Generates samples from a Bayesian network or Dynamic Bayesian network. See for sample code.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Data.Sampling.DataSampler.#ctor(BayesServer.Network)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The Bayesian network or Dynamic Bayesian network the samples will be taken from.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Data.Sampling.DataSampler.#ctor(BayesServer.Network,BayesServer.Inference.IEvidence)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The Bayesian network or Dynamic Bayesian network the samples will be taken from.
Any data that is fixed. Can be null.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Data.Sampling.DataSampler.Network
member.summary: Gets the Bayesian network or Dynamic Bayesian network that was used in the constructor.
member.value: The Bayesian network or Dynamic Bayesian network.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Data.Sampling.DataSampler.TakeSample(BayesServer.Inference.IEvidence,System.Random,BayesServer.Data.Sampling.DataSamplingOptions)
member.summary: Generates sample data from the Bayesian network or Dynamic Bayesian network.
member.remarks:
Each call to generates a single sample. Call repeatedly to generate multiple samples.
For Dynamic Bayesian networks, see to change the length of generated sequences.
member.param: Evidence instance to hold the sample data.
member.exception: Raised if the generation of a sample leads to inconsistent evidence.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Data.Sampling.DataSampler.FixedData
member.summary: Sets any evidence that should be fixed for each sample.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Data.Sampling.DataSamplingOptions.SequenceLength
member.summary: The sequence length generated for each sample from networks with temporal nodes.
member.remarks: This value can be changed between calls to to generate varying length sequences.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Data.Sampling.DataSamplingOptions.MissingDataProbability
member.summary: When positive, sets a certain percentage of values to missing (except when has a value). Valid values are between 0 and 1.

remarks.para: When is set, the missing data probability for each case varies randomly between and .
The missing data mechanism is assumed to be MCAR (Missing Completely At Random).

member.name: P:BayesServer.Data.Sampling.DataSamplingOptions.MissingDataProbabilityMin
member.summary: When set, the missing data probability for each case varies randomly between and . Valid values are between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:BayesServer.Data.Sampling.DataSamplingOptions.MissingDataExclusions
member.summary: Variables can be added, to indicate that they should not generate missing values.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Data.Sampling.ExcludedVariables
member.summary: Set of variables which should be excluded from an operation, such as missing data generation.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Data.Sampling.ExcludedVariables.Contains(BayesServer.Variable)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified variable is excluded.
member.returns: true if the specified variable is excluded; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Data.Sampling.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains classes for sampling data from Bayesian networks and Dynamic Bayesian networks. See for sample code.
